pages.content: Skip to content Lival Frontpage Products Downloads Our story Our partners What’s New Contact A Story of Light from the North Made in Finland – but why? We at Lival take great pride in inventing, designing and manufacturing our products in Finland. Having all these operations under one roof enables quick deliveries and unparalleled quality control. But what exactly makes Finland, of all the places in the world, the best possible location for us? Innovative Engineering Finland has an education system that is among the best in the world. At Lival the Finnish expertise and know-how help us utilize the newest innovations in the lighting field and thus provide our customers products with cutting-edge technology. Sustainability & Durability Finland is the world ́s most environmentally-friendly country and sustainability is in our DNA. Therefore we at Lival take energy efficiency and ecological issues seriously. By using the latest technology such as Citizen COB, we can reduce our need for raw material in smaller form factors. Award-winning Design Finland is known for its Scandinavian design. To meet all of our customers’ lighting needs in retail, fashion and food industry, we at Lival rely on our strong heritage in design. A brief history: Lighting the way for over 70 years Pioneer in lighting solutions, Lival was founded in Finland more than 70 years ago. Lival and Nordic Aluminium have worked together since 1962 when the story of Nordic Aluminium began under Nokia. Lighting tracks were manufactured under Nokia’s brand up until 1996 when Nordic Aluminium got its current name. Lival has been a majority owner of Nordic Aluminium since the early 2000’s, and collaboration between these two companies has matured to become a perfect combination in the professional lighting field. Lival today: Unique Lival Ecosystem Thanks to strong expertise in designing and manufacturing complete lighting systems, Lival today has a position as a globally leading manufacturer. We provide our customers with unique ecosystems consisting of projectors, downlights and linear fixtures that work seamlessly with Nordic Aluminium Global tracks and track adaptors. By controlling the supply of a versatile lighting track system and an extensive range of LED luminaries, we can manufacture and deliver a comprehensive portfolio of professional lighting solutions quickly and cost-effectively. Lival tomorrow: Shaping The Future of Lighting By combining our current competencies and expertise, there are no limits to what we can achieve. The next step for us is to shape the future of lighting with constant development and by making use of the latest technological advancements. To meet universal quality and technological standards also in the future, we invent, design and manufacture cutting-edge technology by utilizing the newest innovations in the lighting field, including high-quality optics, most advanced LED modules, and energy efficient drivers. With sustainable pricing strategy, we want to make high-end luminaires more affordable. Globally saleable innovations and cutting-edge technology such as Citizen COB help us offer an excellent balance between cost and performance. To keep Lival brand globally competitive we are ready to utilize both predominant as well as predicted technologies. Aligned investments also have a significant role in our future. Would you like to know more? We are happy to tell you more about our lighting solutions, designed for versatility and compatibility for various environments and installations. Contact us To learn more about our products that are a perfect fit for all indoor uses, from stores and restaurants to offices, we kindly ask you to discover our luminaire catalogue. Products Lival lival@lival.comShow all contacts > Search: Search

A Story of Light from the North

Made in Finland – but why?

We at Lival take great pride in inventing, designing and manufacturing our products in Finland. Having all these operations under one roof enables quick deliveries and unparalleled quality control. But what exactly makes Finland, of all the places in the world, the best possible location for us?

Innovative Engineering

Finland has an education system that is among the best in the world. At Lival the Finnish expertise and know-how help us utilize the newest innovations in the lighting field and thus provide our customers products with cutting-edge technology.

Sustainability & Durability

Finland is the world ́s most environmentally-friendly country and sustainability is in our DNA. Therefore we at Lival take energy efficiency and ecological issues seriously. By using the latest technology such as Citizen COB, we can reduce our need for raw material in smaller form factors.

Award-winning Design

Finland is known for its Scandinavian design. To meet all of our customers’ lighting needs in retail, fashion and food industry, we at Lival rely on our strong heritage in design.

A brief history: Lighting the way for over 70 years

Pioneer in lighting solutions, Lival was founded in Finland more than 70 years ago. Lival and Nordic Aluminium have worked together since 1962 when the story of Nordic Aluminium began under Nokia. Lighting tracks were manufactured under Nokia’s brand up until 1996 when Nordic Aluminium got its current name. Lival has been a majority owner of Nordic Aluminium since the early 2000’s, and collaboration between these two companies has matured to become a perfect combination in the professional lighting field.

Lival today: Unique Lival Ecosystem

Thanks to strong expertise in designing and manufacturing complete lighting systems, Lival today has a position as a globally leading manufacturer. We provide our customers with unique ecosystems consisting of projectors, downlights and linear fixtures that work seamlessly with Nordic Aluminium Global tracks and track adaptors.

By controlling the supply of a versatile lighting track system and an extensive range of LED luminaries, we can manufacture and deliver a comprehensive portfolio of professional lighting solutions quickly and cost-effectively.

Lival tomorrow: Shaping The Future of Lighting

By combining our current competencies and expertise, there are no limits to what we can achieve. The next step for us is to shape the future of lighting with constant development and by making use of the latest technological advancements.

To meet universal quality and technological standards also in the future, we invent, design and manufacture cutting-edge technology by utilizing the newest innovations in the lighting field, including high-quality optics, most advanced LED modules, and energy efficient drivers.

With sustainable pricing strategy, we want to make high-end luminaires more affordable. Globally saleable innovations and cutting-edge technology such as Citizen COB help us offer an excellent balance between cost and performance.

To keep Lival brand globally competitive we are ready to utilize both predominant as well as predicted technologies. Aligned investments also have a significant role in our future.

Would you like to know more?

We are happy to tell you more about our lighting solutions, designed for versatility and compatibility for various environments and installations.

Contact us

To learn more about our products that are a perfect fit for all indoor uses, from stores and restaurants to offices, we kindly ask you to discover our luminaire catalogue.

Make Your Store’s Lighting Smart Upgrade to energy efficient, connected lighting without changes over the existing track installation. No new control wires needed, resulting to significant savings in installation time (Measured up to 25-50%). Make Your Store’s Lighting Smart

Upgrade to energy efficient, connected lighting without changes over the existing track installation. No new control wires needed, resulting to significant savings in installation time (Measured up to 25-50%).

By integrating occupancy sensors and daylight harvesting to your luminaire network, you can save up to 80% in your energy consumption.

pages.content: Siirry sisältöön LAATUVALMISTAJA Menu Valomainos Oy Meistä Tuotteet ja palvelut Toteutuksia Yhteystiedot Johdattaa asiakkaan perille Ota yhteyttä Johdattaa asiakkaan perille Ota yhteyttä Johdattaa asiakkaan perille Ota yhteyttä Valomainos Oy Laadukkaat valomainokset jo vuodesta 1962. Olemme suomalainen perheyritys, joka on erikoistunut valomainosten valmistukseen. Valomainonta kiinnittää asiakkaasi huomion ja antaa arvokkaan ensivaikutelman. Valomainos johdattaa asiakkaasi perille ja nostaa yrityksesi imagon uudelle tasolle! Laaja valikoima valomainoksia Valikoimamme kattaa kaiken irtokirjainvalomainoksista ja kotelovalomainoksista neonvalomainoksiin ja somisteneoneihin. Valmistamme valomainostaulut ja mainosvalot sisä- ja ulkokäyttöön. Lisäksi valmistamme valaistuja kylttejä, opasteita, liikepaikkapylväitä, mainostorneja ja mainospyloneita. Tarjoamme myös räätälöityjä kokonaisratkaisuja huoltoasemille ja myymälöihin. Lue lisää palveluistamme Tuotteet ja palvelut Lue lisää Toteutuksia Katso täältä! Yhteystiedot Ota yhteyttä! Valovoimaista mainontaa jo vuodesta 1962 Kaikki tuotteemme valmistetaan alusta loppuun omalla tehtaallamme Nurmijärvellä Klaukkalassa. Käytämme tuotannossamme ainoastaan alan uusinta teknologiaa, ja tuotteemme täyttävät tiukat eurooppalaiset standardit. Jokainen valomainoksemme on CE-merkitty, mikä takaa niiden turvallisuuden ja laadun. Katso toteutuksiamme. Valomainokset alusta loppuun: suunnittelu, asennus ja huolto Emme ainoastaan valmista valomainoksia, vaan tarjoamme asiakkaillemme myös suunnittelu-, asennus- ja huoltopalveluita. Lisäksi teemme metallilevyjen laserleikkauksia. Asiantuntijamme varmistavat, että saat juuri sellaisen valomainoksen, joka parhaiten palvelee yrityksesi tarpeita. Ota yhteyttä tänään ja aloitetaan yhteistyö. Lue lisää meistä Teemme alihankintana laserleikkaukset ammattitaitoisesti. Nopeat toimitukset. Kysy lisää Turvallisin Nopein Luotettavin Valomainos Oy | Metsäkyläntie 3, 01800 Klaukkala | Puh. 09 8789 830 | valomainos@valomainos.fi Evästeseloste Ostolaskut sähköpostilla valomainos@valomainos.fi Rekisteriseloste

     <article class="post-4 page type-page status-publish hentry" id="post-4">
      <header class="entry-header">
       <div class="row">
        <div class="column">
         <h1 class="entry-title">
          Valomainos Oy
         </h1>
        </div>
       </div>
      </header>
      <!-- .entry-header -->
      <div class="entry-content">
       <section class="perinteinen content-section">
        <div class="row content-section-row">
         <div class="column palsta yksipalsta palsta-1">
          <h2>
           <span data-contrast="auto">
            Laadukkaat valomainokset jo vuodesta 1962.
           </span>
           <span data-ccp-props='{"201341983":0,"335559739":160,"335559740":259}'>
           </span>
          </h2>
          <p>
           <span data-contrast="auto">
            Olemme suomalainen perheyritys, joka on erikoistunut valomainosten valmistukseen. Valomainonta kiinnittää asiakkaasi huomion ja antaa arvokkaan ensivaikutelman.
           </span>
          </p>
          <p>
           <span data-ccp-props='{"201341983":0,"335559739":160,"335559740":259}'>
            <span class="TextRun SCXW254740271 BCX0" data-contrast="auto" lang="FI-FI" xml:lang="FI-FI">
             <span class="NormalTextRun SCXW254740271 BCX0">
              Valomainos johdattaa asiakkaasi perille ja nostaa yrityksesi imagon uudelle tasolle!
             </span>
            </span>
           </span>
          </p>
          <h2>
           <span data-contrast="auto">
            Laaja valikoima valomainoksia
           </span>
           <span data-ccp-props='{"201341983":0,"335559739":160,"335559740":259}'>
           </span>
          </h2>
          <p>
           <span data-contrast="auto">
            Valikoimamme kattaa kaiken irtokirjainvalomainoksista ja kotelovalomainoksista neonvalomainoksiin ja somisteneoneihin. Valmistamme valomainostaulut ja mainosvalot sisä- ja ulkokäyttöön.
           </span>
           <span data-ccp-props='{"201341983":0,"335559739":160,"335559740":259}'>
           </span>
          </p>
          <p>
           <span data-contrast="auto">
            Lisäksi valmistamme valaistuja kylttejä, opasteita, liikepaikkapylväitä, mainostorneja ja mainospyloneita. Tarjoamme myös räätälöityjä kokonaisratkaisuja huoltoasemille ja myymälöihin.
           </span>
          </p>
          <p>
           <a class="button" href="https://valomainos.fi/tuotteet-ja-palvelut/">
            Lue lisää palveluistamme
           </a>
          </p>
         </div>
        </div>
        <!-- .content-section-row -->
       </section>
       <!-- .perinteinen -->
       <section class="nostolaatikot content-section">
        <div class="fp-hl-container-bg">

            </div>
            <div class="fp-hl-outer">
             <div class="fp-hl-inner">
              <h2 class="fp-hl-title">
               Yhteystiedot
              </h2>
             </div>
             <a class="button fp-hl-button" href="https://valomainos.fi/yhteystiedot/">
              Ota yhteyttä!
             </a>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </section>
       <!-- .nostolaatikot -->
       <section class="perinteinen content-section">
        <div class="row content-section-row">
         <div class="column palsta yksipalsta palsta-1">
          <h2>
           <span data-contrast="auto">
            Valovoimaista mainontaa jo vuodesta 1962
           </span>
           <span data-ccp-props='{"201341983":0,"335559739":160,"335559740":259}'>
           </span>
          </h2>
          <p>
           <span data-contrast="auto">
            Kaikki tuotteemme valmistetaan alusta loppuun omalla tehtaallamme Nurmijärvellä Klaukkalassa. Käytämme tuotannossamme ainoastaan alan uusinta teknologiaa, ja tuotteemme täyttävät tiukat eurooppalaiset standardit. Jokainen valomainoksemme on CE-merkitty, mikä takaa niiden turvallisuuden ja laadun.
           </span>
           <span data-ccp-props='{"201341983":0,"335559739":160,"335559740":259}'>
           </span>
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="https://valomainos.fi/toteutuksia/">
            <span data-contrast="auto">
             Katso toteutuksiamme.
            </span>
           </a>
          </p>
          <h2>
           <span data-ccp-props='{"201341983":0,"335559739":160,"335559740":259}'>
            <br/>
           </span>
           <span data-contrast="auto">
            Valomainokset alusta loppuun: suunnittelu, asennus ja huolto
           </span>
           <span data-ccp-props='{"201341983":0,"335559739":160,"335559740":259}'>
           </span>
          </h2>
          <p>
           <span data-contrast="auto">
            Emme ainoastaan valmista valomainoksia, vaan tarjoamme asiakkaillemme myös suunnittelu-, asennus- ja huoltopalveluita. Lisäksi teemme metallilevyjen laserleikkauksia. Asiantuntijamme varmistavat, että saat juuri sellaisen valomainoksen, joka parhaiten palvelee yrityksesi tarpeita.
           </span>
           <span data-ccp-props='{"201341983":0,"335559739":160,"335559740":259}'>
           </span>
          </p>
          <p>
           <span data-contrast="auto">
            Ota yhteyttä tänään ja aloitetaan yhteistyö.
           </span>
           <span data-ccp-props='{"201341983":0,"335559739":160,"335559740":259}'>
           </span>
          </p>
          <p>
           <a class="button" href="https://valomainos.fi/meista/">
            Lue lisää meistä
           </a>
          </p>
         </div>
        </div>
        <!-- .content-section-row -->
       </section>

           <div class="tekstipalsta column small-12 medium-6 large-6 right">

             <br/>

            </h4>
            <h4 style="text-align: center">

             </a>
            </h4>
           </div>
          </div>

        </div>

pages.content: Siirry sisältöön LAATUVALMISTAJA Menu Valomainos Oy Meistä Tuotteet ja palvelut Toteutuksia Yhteystiedot Johdattaa asiakkaan perille Ota yhteyttä Johdattaa asiakkaan perille Ota yhteyttä Johdattaa asiakkaan perille Ota yhteyttä Valomainos Oy Laadukkaat valomainokset jo vuodesta 1962. Olemme suomalainen perheyritys, joka on erikoistunut valomainosten valmistukseen. Valomainonta kiinnittää asiakkaasi huomion ja antaa arvokkaan ensivaikutelman. Valomainos johdattaa asiakkaasi perille ja nostaa yrityksesi imagon uudelle tasolle! Laaja valikoima valomainoksia Valikoimamme kattaa kaiken irtokirjainvalomainoksista ja kotelovalomainoksista neonvalomainoksiin ja somisteneoneihin. Valmistamme valomainostaulut ja mainosvalot sisä- ja ulkokäyttöön. Lisäksi valmistamme valaistuja kylttejä, opasteita, liikepaikkapylväitä, mainostorneja ja mainospyloneita. Tarjoamme myös räätälöityjä kokonaisratkaisuja huoltoasemille ja myymälöihin. Lue lisää palveluistamme Tuotteet ja palvelut Lue lisää Toteutuksia Katso täältä! Yhteystiedot Ota yhteyttä! Valovoimaista mainontaa jo vuodesta 1962 Kaikki tuotteemme valmistetaan alusta loppuun omalla tehtaallamme Nurmijärvellä Klaukkalassa. Käytämme tuotannossamme ainoastaan alan uusinta teknologiaa, ja tuotteemme täyttävät tiukat eurooppalaiset standardit. Jokainen valomainoksemme on CE-merkitty, mikä takaa niiden turvallisuuden ja laadun. Katso toteutuksiamme. Valomainokset alusta loppuun: suunnittelu, asennus ja huolto Emme ainoastaan valmista valomainoksia, vaan tarjoamme asiakkaillemme myös suunnittelu-, asennus- ja huoltopalveluita. Lisäksi teemme metallilevyjen laserleikkauksia. Asiantuntijamme varmistavat, että saat juuri sellaisen valomainoksen, joka parhaiten palvelee yrityksesi tarpeita. Ota yhteyttä tänään ja aloitetaan yhteistyö. Lue lisää meistä Teemme alihankintana laserleikkaukset ammattitaitoisesti. Nopeat toimitukset. Kysy lisää Turvallisin Nopein Luotettavin Valomainos Oy | Metsäkyläntie 3, 01800 Klaukkala | Puh. 09 8789 830 | valomainos@valomainos.fi Evästeseloste Ostolaskut sähköpostilla valomainos@valomainos.fi Rekisteriseloste

    </span>
   </a>
   <div class="site-content page-middle-section-bg etusivu" id="content">
    <main class="site-main" id="main">
     <article class="post-4 page type-page status-publish hentry" id="post-4">
      <header class="entry-header">
       <div class="row">
        <div class="column">
         <h1 class="entry-title">
          Valomainos Oy
         </h1>
        </div>
       </div>
      </header>
      <!-- .entry-header -->
      <div class="entry-content">
       <section class="perinteinen content-section">
        <div class="row content-section-row">
         <div class="column palsta yksipalsta palsta-1">
          <h2>
           <span data-contrast="auto">
            Laadukkaat valomainokset jo vuodesta 1962.
           </span>
           <span data-ccp-props='{"201341983":0,"335559739":160,"335559740":259}'>
           </span>
          </h2>
          <p>
           <span data-contrast="auto">
            Olemme suomalainen perheyritys, joka on erikoistunut valomainosten valmistukseen. Valomainonta kiinnittää asiakkaasi huomion ja antaa arvokkaan ensivaikutelman.
           </span>
          </p>
          <p>
           <span data-ccp-props='{"201341983":0,"335559739":160,"335559740":259}'>
            <span class="TextRun SCXW254740271 BCX0" data-contrast="auto" lang="FI-FI" xml:lang="FI-FI">
             <span class="NormalTextRun SCXW254740271 BCX0">
              Valomainos johdattaa asiakkaasi perille ja nostaa yrityksesi imagon uudelle tasolle!
             </span>
            </span>
           </span>
          </p>
          <h2>
           <span data-contrast="auto">
            Laaja valikoima valomainoksia
           </span>
           <span data-ccp-props='{"201341983":0,"335559739":160,"335559740":259}'>
           </span>
          </h2>
          <p>
           <span data-contrast="auto">
            Valikoimamme kattaa kaiken irtokirjainvalomainoksista ja kotelovalomainoksista neonvalomainoksiin ja somisteneoneihin. Valmistamme valomainostaulut ja mainosvalot sisä- ja ulkokäyttöön.
           </span>
           <span data-ccp-props='{"201341983":0,"335559739":160,"335559740":259}'>
           </span>
          </p>
          <p>
           <span data-contrast="auto">
            Lisäksi valmistamme valaistuja kylttejä, opasteita, liikepaikkapylväitä, mainostorneja ja mainospyloneita. Tarjoamme myös räätälöityjä kokonaisratkaisuja huoltoasemille ja myymälöihin.
           </span>
          </p>
          <p>
           <a class="button" href="https://valomainos.fi/tuotteet-ja-palvelut/">
            Lue lisää palveluistamme
           </a>
          </p>
         </div>
        </div>
        <!-- .content-section-row -->
       </section>
       <!-- .perinteinen -->
       <section class="nostolaatikot content-section">
        <div class="fp-hl-container-bg">
         <div class="fp-hl-container-overlay">
          <div class="row">
           <div class="column fp-hl-box kolmenostoa wow scroll-reveal">
            <div class="fp-hl-image" style="background-image: url(https://valomainos.fi/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/sokos.jpg);">
            </div>
            <div class="fp-hl-outer">
             <div class="fp-hl-inner">
              <h2 class="fp-hl-title">
               Tuotteet ja palvelut
              </h2>
             </div>
             <a class="button fp-hl-button" href="https://valomainos.fi/tuotteet-ja-palvelut/">
              Lue lisää
             </a>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="column fp-hl-box kolmenostoa wow scroll-reveal">
            <div class="fp-hl-image" style="background-image: url(https://valomainos.fi/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/valomainos-0710-scaled.jpg);">
            </div>
            <div class="fp-hl-outer">
             <div class="fp-hl-inner">
              <h2 class="fp-hl-title">
               Toteutuksia
              </h2>
             </div>
             <a class="button fp-hl-button" href="https://valomainos.fi/toteutuksia/">
              Katso täältä!
             </a>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="column fp-hl-box kolmenostoa wow scroll-reveal">
            <div class="fp-hl-image" style="background-image: url(https://valomainos.fi/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/valomainos-laser-6786-scaled.jpg);">
            </div>
            <div class="fp-hl-outer">
             <div class="fp-hl-inner">
              <h2 class="fp-hl-title">
               Yhteystiedot
              </h2>
             </div>
             <a class="button fp-hl-button" href="https://valomainos.fi/yhteystiedot/">
              Ota yhteyttä!
             </a>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </section>
       <!-- .nostolaatikot -->
       <section class="perinteinen content-section">
        <div class="row content-section-row">
         <div class="column palsta yksipalsta palsta-1">
          <h2>
           <span data-contrast="auto">
            Valovoimaista mainontaa jo vuodesta 1962
           </span>
           <span data-ccp-props='{"201341983":0,"335559739":160,"335559740":259}'>
           </span>
          </h2>
          <p>
           <span data-contrast="auto">
            Kaikki tuotteemme valmistetaan alusta loppuun omalla tehtaallamme Nurmijärvellä Klaukkalassa. Käytämme tuotannossamme ainoastaan alan uusinta teknologiaa, ja tuotteemme täyttävät tiukat eurooppalaiset standardit. Jokainen valomainoksemme on CE-merkitty, mikä takaa niiden turvallisuuden ja laadun.
           </span>
           <span data-ccp-props='{"201341983":0,"335559739":160,"335559740":259}'>
           </span>
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="https://valomainos.fi/toteutuksia/">
            <span data-contrast="auto">
             Katso toteutuksiamme.
            </span>
           </a>
          </p>
          <h2>
           <span data-ccp-props='{"201341983":0,"335559739":160,"335559740":259}'>
            <br/>
           </span>
           <span data-contrast="auto">
            Valomainokset alusta loppuun: suunnittelu, asennus ja huolto
           </span>
           <span data-ccp-props='{"201341983":0,"335559739":160,"335559740":259}'>
           </span>
          </h2>
          <p>
           <span data-contrast="auto">
            Emme ainoastaan valmista valomainoksia, vaan tarjoamme asiakkaillemme myös suunnittelu-, asennus- ja huoltopalveluita. Lisäksi teemme metallilevyjen laserleikkauksia. Asiantuntijamme varmistavat, että saat juuri sellaisen valomainoksen, joka parhaiten palvelee yrityksesi tarpeita.
           </span>
           <span data-ccp-props='{"201341983":0,"335559739":160,"335559740":259}'>
           </span>
          </p>
          <p>
           <span data-contrast="auto">
            Ota yhteyttä tänään ja aloitetaan yhteistyö.
           </span>
           <span data-ccp-props='{"201341983":0,"335559739":160,"335559740":259}'>
           </span>
          </p>
          <p>
           <a class="button" href="https://valomainos.fi/meista/">
            Lue lisää meistä
           </a>
          </p>
         </div>
        </div>
        <!-- .content-section-row -->
       </section>

           <div class="tekstipalsta column small-12 medium-6 large-6 right">
            <h4 style="text-align: center">

             <br/>

            </h4>
            <h4 style="text-align: center">

            </h4>
           </div>

pages.content: Skip to content MENUMENU TuotteetYritysReferenssitYhteys Infra Kotimaisena valmistajana olemme erikoistuneet yhteistyöhön kaupunkien kanssa. Yhdessä asiakkaan kanssa suunnittelemme ja toteutamme kohteeseen räätälöidyt valaisimet, […] Lue lisää Projektit Saman katon alla oleva suunnittelu ja metalliyrityksen konekanta mahdollistavat joustavan projektityöskentelyn. Toteutamme suunnittelijan tai arkkitehdin suunnittelemat valaisimet […] Lue lisää Pihavalaistus Tiesitkö, että ensimmäinen valaisimemme, KÄPY, on yhä tuotannossa yli 30 vuoden jälkeen? Pihavalaisinmallistomme on kasvanut kattamaan […] Lue lisää VIIMEISTELTYÄ LAATUA Tavoitteena on ollut kehittää valaisintuotteita, jotka rasittavat mahdollisimman vähän luonnon tasapainoa, ottamalla huomioon raaka-aineiden kestävyyden ja kierrätettävyyden. Valaisinmuotoilumme lähtökohtana on luoda iloa silmälle unohtamatta toimivuutta. Tutustu valikoimaamme Ota yhteyttä Nimi (pakollinen) Puhelin (pakollinen) Sähköposti (pakollinen) Aihe Viesti Sulje lomake Esite Selaa helposti esitteitämme online-muodossa. Esitteestä löydät kaikki tuotteemme kätevästi yhdessä paketissa. Lue lisää Moderni LED-teknologia vanhaa kunnioittaen – Forssan kaupungintalon toimistohuoneiden valaistus uudistui Forssan kaupungintalo valmistui vuonna 1977. Rakennuksen sisustus ja henki huokuvat vahvasti 1970-lukua, ja sen ainutlaatuista tunnelmaa […] Lue lisää #karluxoy Seuraa Instagramissa Seuraa Instagramissa Mistä löydät meidät: Karlux Oy, 0535364-9 Paassillantie 1, 15880 Hollola info@karlux.fi Karlux numeroina 40 vuotta kokemusta valaisinvalmistuksesta 11 PK-yritystä alihankinnassa Lahden talousalueelta 41 valaisinta valmistuu päivässä 4058 ruuvia ruuvataan viikossa 12 kenkää tallaa päivittäin tehtaan lattiaa 273 kahvikupillista hörpitään kuukaudessa Esitteet: Led -esite LED-Esitteestä löydät kaikki LED-moduulituotteemme, sekä lisäksi taajamavalaisimista LED E27 mallit. Koko valikoima Pitkästä esitteestä löydät kaikki tuotteemme, niin LED-mallit kuin monimetalliversiot. TAKUUEHDOT LÖYDÄT TÄÄLTÄ Ota yhteyttä X Ota meihin yhteyttä! pages.content: Skip to content MENUMENU TuotteetYritysReferenssitYhteys Infra Kotimaisena valmistajana olemme erikoistuneet yhteistyöhön kaupunkien kanssa. Yhdessä asiakkaan kanssa suunnittelemme ja toteutamme kohteeseen räätälöidyt valaisimet, […] Lue lisää Projektit Saman katon alla oleva suunnittelu ja metalliyrityksen konekanta mahdollistavat joustavan projektityöskentelyn. Toteutamme suunnittelijan tai arkkitehdin suunnittelemat valaisimet […] Lue lisää Pihavalaistus Tiesitkö, että ensimmäinen valaisimemme, KÄPY, on yhä tuotannossa yli 30 vuoden jälkeen? Pihavalaisinmallistomme on kasvanut kattamaan […] Lue lisää VIIMEISTELTYÄ LAATUA Tavoitteena on ollut kehittää valaisintuotteita, jotka rasittavat mahdollisimman vähän luonnon tasapainoa, ottamalla huomioon raaka-aineiden kestävyyden ja kierrätettävyyden. Valaisinmuotoilumme lähtökohtana on luoda iloa silmälle unohtamatta toimivuutta. Tutustu valikoimaamme Ota yhteyttä Nimi (pakollinen) Puhelin (pakollinen) Sähköposti (pakollinen) Aihe Viesti Sulje lomake Esite Selaa helposti esitteitämme online-muodossa. Esitteestä löydät kaikki tuotteemme kätevästi yhdessä paketissa. Lue lisää Moderni LED-teknologia vanhaa kunnioittaen – Forssan kaupungintalon toimistohuoneiden valaistus uudistui Forssan kaupungintalo valmistui vuonna 1977. Rakennuksen sisustus ja henki huokuvat vahvasti 1970-lukua, ja sen ainutlaatuista tunnelmaa […] Lue lisää #karluxoy Seuraa Instagramissa Seuraa Instagramissa Mistä löydät meidät: Karlux Oy, 0535364-9 Paassillantie 1, 15880 Hollola info@karlux.fi Karlux numeroina 40 vuotta kokemusta valaisinvalmistuksesta 11 PK-yritystä alihankinnassa Lahden talousalueelta 41 valaisinta valmistuu päivässä 4058 ruuvia ruuvataan viikossa 12 kenkää tallaa päivittäin tehtaan lattiaa 273 kahvikupillista hörpitään kuukaudessa Esitteet: Led -esite LED-Esitteestä löydät kaikki LED-moduulituotteemme, sekä lisäksi taajamavalaisimista LED E27 mallit. Koko valikoima Pitkästä esitteestä löydät kaikki tuotteemme, niin LED-mallit kuin monimetalliversiot. TAKUUEHDOT LÖYDÄT TÄÄLTÄ Ota yhteyttä X Ota meihin yhteyttä! Voit ottaa meihin yhteyttä alla olevalla lomakkeella. Nimi (pakollinen) Puhelin (pakollinen) Sähköposti (pakollinen) Aihe Viesti

pages.content: Tekmala OySuomalaista sairaalatekniikkaa Etusivu Yritys Tuotteet Valaisimet Tutkimusvalaisimet Toimenpidevalaisimet Yleisvalaisimet Vuodevalaisimet Suurennuslasivalaisimet Leikkausvalaisimet Yövalaisimet Lisävarusteet Kattokeskukset Potilaspaneelit Tesal-4LED Tesal-5LED Tetra-11LED Psykiatrian potilassänky Leikkauspöydät Sairaalakalusteet Sängyt ja tutkimuspöydät Yöpöydät Hoivatuolit Parflex sermijärjestelmä Teollisuusvalaisimet Ajankohtaista Yhteystiedot Ota yhteyttä Etusivu Tekmala Oy on vuonna 1986 perustettu perheyritys, joka toimii laadukkaiden sairaalavalaisimien ja potilaspaneeleiden valmistajana. Tekmala on suunnitellut, valmistanut ja markkinoinut sairaalateknisiä tuotteita suomalaisiin sairaaloihin, terveyskeskuksiin ja muihin julkisiin tiloihin jo yli 30 vuoden ajan. Tekmalan toimintaa ohjaavat korkeatasoinen laatu, muotoilu ja suomalaisuus. Tekmalalle tärkeitä arvoja ovat tyytyväiset asiakkaat ja hyvä palvelu, henkilöstön ammattitaito ja toiminnan tuloksellisuus. Tekmalan mallisto kattaa lähes kaikki sairaalatilat leikkaussaleista vuodeosastojen potilashuoneisiin. Tekmala edustaa Suomessa myös useita eurooppalaisia valmistajia, joiden tuotteistoihin kuuluvat mm. tutkimus-, toimenpide- ja leikkausvalaisimet, kattokeskukset, leikkauspöydät, sairaalakalusteet sekä teollisuusvalaisimet. Ajankohtaista Uudet potilaspaneelit AIS, AURA sekä N270 22.4.2024 Parflex sermijärjestelmä 14.3.2023 Mauro hoivatuoli nousu-, ja istumisavustuksella 10.3.2023 Mauro kuljetus- ja hoivatuoli 28.10.2022 Mauro Ergo-line lepotuoli 10.5.2022 Sairaalakalusteet Potilaspaneelit Leikkauspöydät Valaisimet Kattokeskukset Teollisuusvalaisimet Yhteystiedot Tekmala Oy Veikkointie 22 03100 NUMMELA Puhelin 0207 924 200 Sähköposti info@tekmala.fi Etusivu Yritys Tuotteet Ajankohtaista Ota yhteyttä Yhteystiedot ·Toteutus ja ylläpito MMD Networks·

Etusivu

Tekmala Oy on vuonna 1986 perustettu perheyritys, joka toimii laadukkaiden sairaalavalaisimien ja potilaspaneeleiden valmistajana.

Tekmala on suunnitellut, valmistanut ja markkinoinut sairaalateknisiä tuotteita suomalaisiin sairaaloihin, terveyskeskuksiin ja muihin julkisiin tiloihin jo yli 30 vuoden ajan.

Tekmalan toimintaa ohjaavat korkeatasoinen laatu, muotoilu ja suomalaisuus. Tekmalalle tärkeitä arvoja ovat tyytyväiset asiakkaat ja hyvä palvelu, henkilöstön ammattitaito ja toiminnan tuloksellisuus. Tekmalan mallisto kattaa lähes kaikki sairaalatilat leikkaussaleista vuodeosastojen potilashuoneisiin.

Tekmala edustaa Suomessa myös useita eurooppalaisia valmistajia, joiden tuotteistoihin kuuluvat mm. tutkimus-, toimenpide- ja leikkausvalaisimet, kattokeskukset, leikkauspöydät, sairaalakalusteet sekä teollisuusvalaisimet.

Ajankohtaista

  • Uudet potilaspaneelit AIS, AURA sekä N270 22.4.2024
  • Parflex sermijärjestelmä 14.3.2023
  • Mauro hoivatuoli nousu-, ja istumisavustuksella 10.3.2023
  • Mauro kuljetus- ja hoivatuoli 28.10.2022
  • Mauro Ergo-line lepotuoli 10.5.2022

pages.content: Navigation Close Ex-Lighting Solutions Ex-Lighting Products Blogs, News & Videos Company Knowledge base Contact us Atexor Downloads Atexor UK Find a Distributor Contact us Ex-Lighting Technology LeadersAtexor's team specializes in designing and manufacturing IECEx, ATEX and UKEX lighting for Explosion Hazardous Areas. In addition to ready-made products, we create custom designed solutions to meet specific customer requirements. Recognized around the world for our quality and reliability, all Atexor products and solutions are designed and manufactured in Finland. Ex-Lighting Solutions ATEX EUROFINS KOSHA NEPSI TÜV RHEINLAND EAC IECEx TIIS Ex CE 0537 CML UKEX NSN Atexor provides ATEX and IECEx certified lighting solutions for Ex Zones, as well as UKCA, KOSHA, NEPSI, DNV and other relevant product certifications. Ex-Expertise at Your ServiceWith over 40 years' experience creating lighting solutions for Explosion Hazard Areas, Atexor is a partner you can rely on. We are part of Teknopower Group, an expert in demanding lighting systems with partners operating in more than 30 countries. About us Meet the Team Get to know our team of highly motivated experts. We have decades of Ex-lighting experience and are ready to serve you. Read more Light Planning Our experienced specialists can create the optimal lighting plan for your Ex area. Read more Case Studies Learn about how the Atexor Ex-Lighting Solutions Team has worked hand-in-hand with customers to deliver bespoke Ex-lighting solutions. Read more Ex-Lighting ProductsIn addition to bespoke solutions, Atexor offers a range of ATEX and IECEx certified products, including SLAM® portable luminaires, SLAM FIXED® lighting, MICA® hand lamps, cables, fittings, and more. Find a product Handlamps Temporary luminaires Fixed luminaires Learn About Ex-LightingDifferent terminology for explosion protected or explosion proof lighting is sometimes used in different markets. However, Atexor can ensure that the lightings solutions we provide meet all safety requirements, wherever you are located. So whether you are looking for Ex-proof lights, Ex rated lights, explosion protected lights, explosion proof luminaires, hazardous area lighting, intrinsically safe LED lamps, or ATEX approved lighting, we can deliver what you need. Knowledgebase Blog & News Atexor Knowledge Base Posted on 21/11/2024 by Team Atexor Our team member Tarmo would like to remind you about the Atexor Knowledge Base we created for you. ... Read more SLAM FIXED® Novo product family and its special advantages Posted on 16/05/2024 by Team Atexor Introducing the new Novo Ex Area lighting product family. The advantages offered by the new structure and why installing Novos is so quick and easy. ... Read more Helsinki Particle Accelerator and MICA® EM Handlamps Posted on 6/11/2023 Important science is taking place at the University of Helsinki Particle Accelerator Laboratory. To ensure their work continues when the lights go out, they turned to Atexor for backup lighting using MICA® EM handlamps. ... Read more Blog & news Social media Our factory in Seinajoki will be closed in the week of 31/2024 for the traditional summer break.... Read more Another informative video from Team Atexor and our own Tuomas. Enjoy!... Read more Ready for orders: SLAM FIXED® Novo 1LED & 2LED! Take a break and check out the product video on our... Read more NOTICE: Atexor Summer Break and our factory closed for one week. Our factory in Seinäjoki is closed during the week... Read more A lovely Finnish summer day offered us great conditions for a Fatbike excursion in nature.... Read more Hyvää Itsenäisyyspäivää, Suomi! 💙 Happy Independence Day, Finland! 🤍. 105 years and counting! The anniversary of Finland’s independence is a... Read more Welcome meet the Atexor team and our brand new SLAM® Neos Ex lighting range at our official UK launch at... Read more The MICA® IL-640 / IL-6400 now features an upgraded circuit board for improved power delivery and management to the latest... Read more Contact usOur team is ready to help solve your Ex-lighting needs! Contact us Atexor - Ex-Lighting Technology Leaders ATEXOR OY Switchboad +358 20 734 3250 Headquarters Suomalaistentie 7 FI-02270 Espoo, Finland Manufacturing Puurtajantie 16 FI-60100 Seinäjoki, Finland Subscribe to our newsletter Subscribe Follow us on Social media Ex-Lighting Solutions Ex-Lighting Products MICA® SLAM® SLAM FIXED® Knowledge base Blogs, News & Videos Company Team Training Atexor Downloads Contact us Find a distributor Atexor UK © Atexor 2024 • Privacy notice • Cookie policy WE ARE EXPANDING OUR PARTNER NETWORK Help meet the growing demand for quality ATEX and IECEx No Yes

  <script type="text/javascript">
   var d = new Date();

		// If clicked the no button in modal
		$('#modal-no').click(function(){

			$('.popup-modal-container').addClass('hidden');
			$('body').removeClass('fixed');

			setCookie('atexorpopup', 1, d);
		});

		// If clicked the yes button in modal
		$('#modal-yes').click(function(){

			var url = $(this).data('url')
			
			$('.popup-modal-container').addClass('hidden');
			$('body').removeClass('fixed');

			setCookie('atexorpopup', 1, d);

			// redirect to the selected page
			window.location.href = url;
		});


		function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
		  	var d = new Date();
		  	d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
		  	var expires = "expires="+ d.toUTCString();
		  	
		  	document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires + ";path=/";
		}

		
		function getCookie(cname) {
		  	var name = cname + "=";
		  	var decodedCookie = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);
		  	var ca = decodedCookie.split(';');
		  
		  	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		    	var c = ca[i];
		    		
	    		while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') {
	      			c = c.substring(1);
	    		}
	    
	    		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
	      			return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
	    		}
		  	}
		  
		  	return "";
		}


		function checkCookie() {
		  	var cookie = getCookie("atexorpopup");

		  	var seconds = '120';
			var pages = '5';

		  	// If cookie is not set
		  	if (cookie != "") {

		  	// If cookie is set
		  	} else {

		  		if(seconds){

		  			// The time after modal shows
					var time = seconds * 1000;

					// Show modal after the set time
					setTimeout( function(){
						$('.popup-modal-container').removeClass('hidden');
						$('body').addClass('fixed');
					}, time );
				}

			
				if(pages){
					// Get number of visited pages
					var visitedPages =  parseInt(getCookie('atexorpages'));


					// If number is the same as settings show modal
					if(visitedPages >= pages){

						// Show modal after 3 seconds
						setTimeout( function(){
							$('.popup-modal-container').removeClass('hidden');
							$('body').addClass('fixed');
						}, 2000 );

					// Add 1 to visited pages numbers
					} else if(visitedPages){

						var newNumber = visitedPages +1;
						setCookie('atexorpages', newNumber, d);

					// If there is no visited pages set number at 1
					} else{

						setCookie('atexorpages', 2, d);
					}
				}
		   		
		  	}
		}

		checkCookie();
  </script>

pages.content: Navigation Close Ex-Lighting Solutions Ex-Lighting Products Blogs, News & Videos Company Knowledge base Contact us Atexor Downloads Atexor UK Find a Distributor Contact us Ex-Lighting Solutions At Atexor we specialize in delivering robust Ex-lighting solutions that meet your exact requirements. We take care of everything from initial concepting to mass production of bespoke luminaires, including lighting planning, testing and certification. All Atexor products are designed and manufactured in Finland. Ex-Lighting Development ProcessWe work with you to design, test and manufacture the most suitable Ex-lighting solutions for your specific requirements. With our lean manufacturing processes, modular designs, and agile organization, you can rely on us to move quickly and deliver fast. Project kick off Identify and set common goals Solution design Including product design and illumination planning Approval For all required standards, including ATEX and IECEx Testing of each individual product before shipping Delivery Delivery of the solutions and full documentation Atexor service and customer support Meet Our TeamOur team includes leading experts in the Ex-lighting industry, and our in-house experience is unmatched. We are ready to take on any Ex hazardous area lighting challenge you have. Get to know us Lighting PlanWhether temporary or fixed, Atexor’s illumination design experts can create a lighting plan for you to ensure your workers have the light they need to perform their jobs safely. A good lighting plan also ensures you get just what you need, optimizing both lighting and costs. Our laboratory is equipped with specialized, highly-advanced equipment and software for measuring light and handling special requirements such as color temperature. With these tools and our in-depth knowledge, we determine the ideal location for your work lights. In addition to the lighting plan, we also offer a live demo of the Ex-lighting solution. A live demo is the best way to show the actual impact of lighting choices, and we highly recommend it. QualityWith years of experience creating Ex-lighting solutions, we understand the requirements of Ex Zones and what is needed to ensure our solutions pass the rigorous testing and certification processes of different markets. Quality assurance is a core element of our entire product development process and carefully control component suppliers. Every single Atexor product is tested before shipping and comes with its own signed report. All Atexor products are designed and manufactured in Finland. Top quality extends to our services, where we treat good customer service as a matter of pride. We work closely and effectively with our customers and can scale up product of bespoke solutions quickly. Whether you need fixed or portable Ex-lighting, you can rely on Atexor. Contact us TrainingAtexor’s experts offer training courses for different aspects of Ex-lighting, from general topics to hands-on training how to service and maintain Atexor luminaires. Learn more Case StudiesAtexor works with customers around the world, creating bespoke Ex-lighting solutions to meet unique requirements and demanding schedules. Here you can read how we have helped our customers succeed. Neste Refinery Lighting Starting from scratch, a joint development project results in a complete Ex-lighting solution with custom SLAM FIXED® LED luminaires suited for particularly cold climates. Borealis Petrochemical Plant and ATEX Lighting Atexor Ex luminaires improve the quality and energy efficiency of ATEX lighting at the Borealis petrochemical production plants in Finland. Gas Cabinet Machine Lamp Atexor SEMIC luminaires provide safe lighting in gas unit cabinets for semiconductor production. Contact usOur team is ready to help solve your Ex-lighting needs! Contact us Atexor - Ex-Lighting Technology Leaders ATEXOR OY Switchboad +358 20 734 3250 Headquarters Suomalaistentie 7 FI-02270 Espoo, Finland Manufacturing Puurtajantie 16 FI-60100 Seinäjoki, Finland Subscribe to our newsletter Subscribe Follow us on Social media Ex-Lighting Solutions Ex-Lighting Products MICA® SLAM® SLAM FIXED® Knowledge base Blogs, News & Videos Company Team Training Atexor Downloads Contact us Find a distributor Atexor UK © Atexor 2024 • Privacy notice • Cookie policy WE ARE EXPANDING OUR PARTNER NETWORK Help meet the growing demand for quality ATEX and IECEx No Yes

       <p>

We take care of everything from initial concepting to mass production of bespoke luminaires, including lighting planning, testing and certification. All Atexor products are designed and manufactured in Finland.

       <h2>
        Meet Our Team
       </h2>
       <p>
        <p>
         Our team includes leading experts in the Ex-lighting industry, and our in-house experience is unmatched. We are ready to take on any Ex hazardous area lighting challenge you have.

   <div class="full-lift" id="lighting-plan">
    <div class="desktop-image-always">
     <div style="background-image: url('https://www.atexor.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/left_text_100_bg1.jpg');">
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="container-fluid middle white">
     <div class="row no-margin">
      <div class="col-md-6 col-sm-8 left text-container">
       <h2>
        Lighting Plan
       </h2>
       <p>
        <p>
         Whether temporary or fixed, Atexor’s illumination design experts can create a lighting plan for you to ensure your workers have the light they need to perform their jobs safely. A good lighting plan also ensures you get just what you need, optimizing both lighting and costs.
        </p>
        <p>
         Our laboratory is equipped with specialized, highly-advanced equipment and software for measuring light and handling special requirements such as color temperature. With these tools and our in-depth knowledge, we determine the ideal location for your work lights.
        </p>
        <p>
         In addition to the lighting plan, we also offer a live demo of the Ex-lighting solution. A live demo is the best way to show the actual impact of lighting choices, and we highly recommend it.
        </p>
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="clearfix">
   </div>
   <div class="text-image-column bg-white">
    <div class="desktop-image-always">
     <div style="background-image: url('https://www.atexor.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Rectangle-833.png');">
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="container-fluid black">
     <div class="row">
      <div class="col-sm-6 image-container">
       <picture>
        <img alt="" src="https://www.atexor.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/quality-e1548849814881.png"/>
       </picture>
      </div>
      <div class="col-sm-5 col-sm-offset-1 text-container">
       <h2>
        Quality
       </h2>
       <p class="p1">
        With years of experience creating Ex-lighting solutions, we understand the requirements of Ex Zones and what is needed to ensure our solutions pass the rigorous testing and certification processes of different markets.
       </p>
       <p class="p1">
        Quality assurance is a core element of our entire product development process and carefully control component suppliers. Every single Atexor product is tested before shipping and comes with its own signed report. All Atexor products are designed and manufactured in Finland.
       </p>
       <p class="p1">
        Top quality extends to our services, where we treat good customer service as a matter of pride. We work closely and effectively with our customers and can scale up product of bespoke solutions quickly. Whether you need fixed or portable Ex-lighting, you can rely on Atexor.
       </p>
       <a class="button" href="https://www.atexor.com/contact-us/" target="">
        Contact us
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>

  <script type="text/javascript">
   var d = new Date();

		// If clicked the no button in modal
		$('#modal-no').click(function(){

			$('.popup-modal-container').addClass('hidden');
			$('body').removeClass('fixed');

			setCookie('atexorpopup', 1, d);
		});

		// If clicked the yes button in modal
		$('#modal-yes').click(function(){

			var url = $(this).data('url')
			
			$('.popup-modal-container').addClass('hidden');
			$('body').removeClass('fixed');

			setCookie('atexorpopup', 1, d);

			// redirect to the selected page
			window.location.href = url;
		});


		function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
		  	var d = new Date();
		  	d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
		  	var expires = "expires="+ d.toUTCString();
		  	
		  	document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires + ";path=/";
		}

		
		function getCookie(cname) {
		  	var name = cname + "=";
		  	var decodedCookie = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);
		  	var ca = decodedCookie.split(';');
		  
		  	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		    	var c = ca[i];
		    		
	    		while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') {
	      			c = c.substring(1);
	    		}
	    
	    		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
	      			return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
	    		}
		  	}
		  
		  	return "";
		}


		function checkCookie() {
		  	var cookie = getCookie("atexorpopup");

		  	var seconds = '120';
			var pages = '5';

		  	// If cookie is not set
		  	if (cookie != "") {

		  	// If cookie is set
		  	} else {

		  		if(seconds){

		  			// The time after modal shows
					var time = seconds * 1000;

					// Show modal after the set time
					setTimeout( function(){
						$('.popup-modal-container').removeClass('hidden');
						$('body').addClass('fixed');
					}, time );
				}

			
				if(pages){
					// Get number of visited pages
					var visitedPages =  parseInt(getCookie('atexorpages'));


					// If number is the same as settings show modal
					if(visitedPages >= pages){

						// Show modal after 3 seconds
						setTimeout( function(){
							$('.popup-modal-container').removeClass('hidden');
							$('body').addClass('fixed');
						}, 2000 );

					// Add 1 to visited pages numbers
					} else if(visitedPages){

						var newNumber = visitedPages +1;
						setCookie('atexorpages', newNumber, d);

					// If there is no visited pages set number at 1
					} else{

						setCookie('atexorpages', 2, d);
					}
				}
		   		
		  	}
		}

		checkCookie();
  </script>

pages.content: Navigation Close Ex-Lighting Solutions Ex-Lighting Products Blogs, News & Videos Company Knowledge base Contact us Atexor Downloads Atexor UK Find a Distributor Contact us Ex-lighting products The Atexor range of Ex certified lighting products includes SLAM FIXED® light fittings, SLAM® portable lighting and power supplies, and rechargeable MICA® hand lamps, as well as a range of accessories. All Atexor products are made in our own factory and they are thoroughly tested to ensure safety, reliability and durability. In addition to ATEX and IECEx certified products for Ex zones, we offer products with EAC, KOSHA, NEPSI, DNV and other certifications. The MICA® range includes also rechargeable hand lamps for signalling and industrial use. All products are developed and manufactured in Finland by Atexor Oy. Find a product ATEX IECEx Temporary lighting Zone 0 Zone 1 Zone 20 Zone 21 Hand lamps Atexor MICA® rechargeable hand lamps, signal lamps and flashlights offer you reliable, heavy-duty lighting for explosion hazardous areas and other demanding conditions. Available with ATEX and IECEx certifications. Our MICA® family is designed to withstand extremely rough handling. See products Fixed lighting Atexor SLAM FIXED® luminaires are ATEX, IECEx and UKEX approved lights built for potentially explosive work sites, refineries and warehouses. We offer both off-the-shelf options as well as bespoke luminaires customer-specific projects. See products Portable lighting Atexor SLAM® product family for temporary illumination and power supply in confined spaces and other hazardous areas. From ATEX / IECEx certified cable reels to comprehensive portable lighting systems and fully antistatic fixing systems. Our SLAM® product line has been imitated many times, but never successfully. See products We can also design custom Ex-lighting solutions to meet your exact needs Learn more Maintenance trainingAtexor offers a range of training courses about different aspects of Ex lighting covering everything from safety and to maintenance of Ex lighting products. Learn more Illumination Design In addition to offering Ex-lighting products and solutions, we can also plan the optimum illumination layout for you. Quality & TestingAtexor is well-known for the high quality of its products and services. All our products are tested individually to ensure reliability, safety and compliance, and they are certified to meet the Ex ratings you require. Contact usOur team is ready to help solve your Ex-lighting needs! Contact us Atexor - Ex-Lighting Technology Leaders ATEXOR OY Switchboad +358 20 734 3250 Headquarters Suomalaistentie 7 FI-02270 Espoo, Finland Manufacturing Puurtajantie 16 FI-60100 Seinäjoki, Finland Subscribe to our newsletter Subscribe Follow us on Social media Ex-Lighting Solutions Ex-Lighting Products MICA® SLAM® SLAM FIXED® Knowledge base Blogs, News & Videos Company Team Training Atexor Downloads Contact us Find a distributor Atexor UK © Atexor 2024 • Privacy notice • Cookie policy WE ARE EXPANDING OUR PARTNER NETWORK Help meet the growing demand for quality ATEX and IECEx No Yes

The MICA® range includes also rechargeable hand lamps for signalling and industrial use. All products are developed and manufactured in Finland by Atexor Oy.

  <script type="text/javascript">
   var d = new Date();

		// If clicked the no button in modal
		$('#modal-no').click(function(){

			$('.popup-modal-container').addClass('hidden');
			$('body').removeClass('fixed');

			setCookie('atexorpopup', 1, d);
		});

		// If clicked the yes button in modal
		$('#modal-yes').click(function(){

			var url = $(this).data('url')
			
			$('.popup-modal-container').addClass('hidden');
			$('body').removeClass('fixed');

			setCookie('atexorpopup', 1, d);

			// redirect to the selected page
			window.location.href = url;
		});


		function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
		  	var d = new Date();
		  	d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
		  	var expires = "expires="+ d.toUTCString();
		  	
		  	document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires + ";path=/";
		}

		
		function getCookie(cname) {
		  	var name = cname + "=";
		  	var decodedCookie = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);
		  	var ca = decodedCookie.split(';');
		  
		  	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		    	var c = ca[i];
		    		
	    		while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') {
	      			c = c.substring(1);
	    		}
	    
	    		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
	      			return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
	    		}
		  	}
		  
		  	return "";
		}


		function checkCookie() {
		  	var cookie = getCookie("atexorpopup");

		  	var seconds = '120';
			var pages = '5';

		  	// If cookie is not set
		  	if (cookie != "") {

		  	// If cookie is set
		  	} else {

		  		if(seconds){

		  			// The time after modal shows
					var time = seconds * 1000;

					// Show modal after the set time
					setTimeout( function(){
						$('.popup-modal-container').removeClass('hidden');
						$('body').addClass('fixed');
					}, time );
				}

			
				if(pages){
					// Get number of visited pages
					var visitedPages =  parseInt(getCookie('atexorpages'));


					// If number is the same as settings show modal
					if(visitedPages >= pages){

						// Show modal after 3 seconds
						setTimeout( function(){
							$('.popup-modal-container').removeClass('hidden');
							$('body').addClass('fixed');
						}, 2000 );

					// Add 1 to visited pages numbers
					} else if(visitedPages){

						var newNumber = visitedPages +1;
						setCookie('atexorpages', newNumber, d);

					// If there is no visited pages set number at 1
					} else{

						setCookie('atexorpages', 2, d);
					}
				}
		   		
		  	}
		}

		checkCookie();
  </script>

pages.content: Navigation Close Ex-Lighting Solutions Ex-Lighting Products Blogs, News & Videos Company Knowledge base Contact us Atexor Downloads Atexor UK Find a Distributor Contact us Blogs & News Keep up with the latest from Atexor! Contact us at any time to find out more about our custom Ex-lighting solutions. Atexor Knowledge Base Posted on: 21.11.2024 by Team Atexor Our team member Tarmo would like to remind you about the Atexor Knowledge Base we created for you. Read more » Traditional Summer Break 2024 Posted on: 27.6.2024 by Team Atexor Our factory in Seinajoki will be closed in the week of 31/2024 for the traditional summer break. Read more » SLAM FIXED® Novo product family and its special advantages Posted on: 16.5.2024 by Team Atexor Introducing the new Novo Ex Area lighting product family. The advantages offered by the new structure and why installing Novos is so quick and easy. Read more » Warm wishes to clients and partners from everyone at Atexor! Posted on: 24.12.2023 by Team Atexor Wishing you a joyful holiday season and a wonderful start to the New Year! We want to thank you for your support and collaboration over the course of this year and hope for an even better 2024. Read more » Helsinki Particle Accelerator and MICA® EM Handlamps Posted on: 6.11.2023 Important science is taking place at the University of Helsinki Particle Accelerator Laboratory. To ensure their work continues when the lights go out, they turned to Atexor for backup lighting using MICA® EM handlamps. Read more » MICA ® IL-640 and IL-6400 new components for better performance Posted on: 13.10.2022 Atexor has secured a significant LED upgrade to our leading rechargeable handlamp, the MICA® IL-640. Read more » Atexor and Finnish Cinema Posted on: 19.9.2022 by Team Atexor An Atexor First – Lighting up Finnish Cinema! It’s a dark, dystopian future for the people of the Scandinavian Union, the fictional setting of Veden Vartija (Memory of Water), a Read more » Traditional Summer Break Posted on: 6.6.2022 by Team Atexor Dear friends, we hope you will notice our two weeks of factory vacation. Read more » MICA Elektro LLC is closing Posted on: 8.3.2022 Atexor Oy is ending its business in Russia. Our Russian daughter company MICA Elektro LLC will no longer operate and the office in Saint Petersburg is closing. Read more » New features and market-first UKCA certification for SLAM® TrafoEX step-down transformer Posted on: 30.11.2021 by Team Atexor The Atexor team is delighted to announce re-certification of our SLAM® TrafoEX step-down transformer. Our Ex transformer is certified according to the latest ATEX & IECEx standards, and now, way ahead of schedule, we have full UKCA certification as well. Read more » View All Blog News Video Recent blog posts Atexor Knowledge Base Traditional Summer Break 2024 Warm wishes to clients and partners from everyone at Atexor! New features and market-first UKCA certification for SLAM® TrafoEX step-down transformer Funding for SEMIC Project from Business Finland Recent news SLAM FIXED® Novo product family and its special advantages Helsinki Particle Accelerator and MICA® EM Handlamps MICA ® IL-640 and IL-6400 new components for better performance Atexor and Finnish Cinema Traditional Summer Break Archives November 2024 (1) June 2024 (1) May 2024 (1) December 2023 (1) November 2023 (1) October 2022 (1) September 2022 (1) June 2022 (1) March 2022 (1) November 2021 (1) September 2021 (2) August 2021 (1) June 2021 (1) April 2021 (2) January 2021 (1) October 2020 (3) August 2020 (1) May 2020 (1) April 2020 (2) March 2020 (2) February 2020 (1) January 2020 (1) November 2019 (1) October 2019 (1) September 2019 (1) July 2019 (1) June 2019 (4) May 2019 (2) April 2019 (3) March 2019 (1) January 2019 (1) December 2018 (2) November 2018 (2) October 2018 (4) September 2018 (3) August 2018 (2) July 2018 (2) June 2018 (4) May 2018 (3) April 2018 (1) March 2018 (2) February 2018 (5) January 2018 (2) December 2017 (3) November 2017 (1) April 2017 (1) December 2016 (1) October 2016 (1) September 2016 (1) August 2016 (1) March 2016 (2) December 2015 (1) July 2015 (1) October 2014 (4) September 2014 (1) March 2014 (1) Contact usOur team is ready to help solve your Ex-lighting needs! Contact us Atexor - Ex-Lighting Technology Leaders ATEXOR OY Switchboad +358 20 734 3250 Headquarters Suomalaistentie 7 FI-02270 Espoo, Finland Manufacturing Puurtajantie 16 FI-60100 Seinäjoki, Finland Subscribe to our newsletter Subscribe Follow us on Social media Ex-Lighting Solutions Ex-Lighting Products MICA® SLAM® SLAM FIXED® Knowledge base Blogs, News & Videos Company Team Training Atexor Downloads Contact us Find a distributor Atexor UK © Atexor 2024 • Privacy notice • Cookie policy WE ARE EXPANDING OUR PARTNER NETWORK Help meet the growing demand for quality ATEX and IECEx No Yes

   <script type="text/javascript">
    var d = new Date();

		// If clicked the no button in modal
		$('#modal-no').click(function(){

			$('.popup-modal-container').addClass('hidden');
			$('body').removeClass('fixed');

			setCookie('atexorpopup', 1, d);
		});

		// If clicked the yes button in modal
		$('#modal-yes').click(function(){

			var url = $(this).data('url')
			
			$('.popup-modal-container').addClass('hidden');
			$('body').removeClass('fixed');

			setCookie('atexorpopup', 1, d);

			// redirect to the selected page
			window.location.href = url;
		});


		function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
		  	var d = new Date();
		  	d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
		  	var expires = "expires="+ d.toUTCString();
		  	
		  	document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires + ";path=/";
		}

		
		function getCookie(cname) {
		  	var name = cname + "=";
		  	var decodedCookie = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);
		  	var ca = decodedCookie.split(';');
		  
		  	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		    	var c = ca[i];
		    		
	    		while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') {
	      			c = c.substring(1);
	    		}
	    
	    		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
	      			return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
	    		}
		  	}
		  
		  	return "";
		}


		function checkCookie() {
		  	var cookie = getCookie("atexorpopup");

		  	var seconds = '120';
			var pages = '5';

		  	// If cookie is not set
		  	if (cookie != "") {

		  	// If cookie is set
		  	} else {

		  		if(seconds){

		  			// The time after modal shows
					var time = seconds * 1000;

					// Show modal after the set time
					setTimeout( function(){
						$('.popup-modal-container').removeClass('hidden');
						$('body').addClass('fixed');
					}, time );
				}

			
				if(pages){
					// Get number of visited pages
					var visitedPages =  parseInt(getCookie('atexorpages'));


					// If number is the same as settings show modal
					if(visitedPages >= pages){

						// Show modal after 3 seconds
						setTimeout( function(){
							$('.popup-modal-container').removeClass('hidden');
							$('body').addClass('fixed');
						}, 2000 );

					// Add 1 to visited pages numbers
					} else if(visitedPages){

						var newNumber = visitedPages +1;
						setCookie('atexorpages', newNumber, d);

					// If there is no visited pages set number at 1
					} else{

						setCookie('atexorpages', 2, d);
					}
				}
		   		
		  	}
		}

		checkCookie();
   </script>

pages.content: Navigation Close Ex-Lighting Solutions Ex-Lighting Products Blogs, News & Videos Company Knowledge base Contact us Atexor Downloads Atexor UK Find a Distributor Contact us Our company Atexor Oy is a privately-owned company that designs and manufactures ATEX, UKEX and IECEx lighting and power distribution for Explosion Hazardous Areas. We specialize in creating bespoke solutions for demanding requirements. Our customers recognize us for our quality and reliability. The Atexor team plays an active role on international committees developing standards for Ex-equipment. All Atexor lighting products are designed and manufactured in Finland. Part of Teknopower Group Atexor Oy is wholly owned by Teknopower Group. With partners in over 30 countries and a strong financial and technical position, Teknopower provides solid backing for Atexor. The Teknopower Group includes Atexor, Teknoware, and FLS Finland. Teknoware is a leading provider of vehicle and emergency lighting, including trains and ships. FLS Finland makes LED display systems, parking guidance and management solutions. Meet Our TeamOur team includes leading experts in the Ex-lighting industry, and our in-house experience is unmatched. We are ready to take on any Explosion Hazardous Area lighting challenge you have. Get to know us Our Customers Atexor serves customers in a wide range of industries and applications: oil and gas, petrochemical, refineries, mining, drill ships, manufacturing, mills, transport, firefighting, defense, chemicals, and semiconductors. Our customers rely on us to provide safe, dependable Ex-lighting for both portable and fixed applications in Ex Zones. Our Story Built on the combined excellence of Centaurea Oy and Mica Elektro Oy Ltd., Atexor Oy has 40 years of experience in Ex-lighting solutions. We continually strive to create better solutions for our customers around the world. In addition to our Finnish operations, we established Atexor Ltd. in the UK in 2016. Our in-house knowledge, skill and expertise give us exceptional, wide-ranging capabilities. We can design and manufacture everything from individual, bespoke luminaires to complete, turnkey Ex-lighting solutions. With an ISO 9001:2015 Management System and ATEX certified production, our products and solutions are the result of world-class engineering, proven through end-to-end testing. We have our own design, testing and manufacturing facilities in Finland, which helps us ensure quality and timely deliveries. Link to the ISO 9001:2015 certificate and other important files from our Downloads page. Contact usOur team is ready to help solve your Ex-lighting needs! Contact us Atexor - Ex-Lighting Technology Leaders ATEXOR OY Switchboad +358 20 734 3250 Headquarters Suomalaistentie 7 FI-02270 Espoo, Finland Manufacturing Puurtajantie 16 FI-60100 Seinäjoki, Finland Subscribe to our newsletter Subscribe Follow us on Social media Ex-Lighting Solutions Ex-Lighting Products MICA® SLAM® SLAM FIXED® Knowledge base Blogs, News & Videos Company Team Training Atexor Downloads Contact us Find a distributor Atexor UK © Atexor 2024 • Privacy notice • Cookie policy WE ARE EXPANDING OUR PARTNER NETWORK Help meet the growing demand for quality ATEX and IECEx No Yes

  <div class="page-content">
   <div class="hero hero-subpage hero-big">
    <div class="desktop-image-always">
     <div style="background-image: url('https://www.atexor.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/company_header_image_bg.jpg');">
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="container-fluid">
     <div class="col-md-10 col-md-offset-1 text-container">
      <h1 class="title">
       Our company
      </h1>
     </div>
     <div class="col-md-6 col-sm-10 col-md-offset-3 col-sm-offset-1 text-container">
      <span class="text">
       <p>
        Atexor Oy is a privately-owned company that designs and manufactures ATEX, UKEX and IECEx lighting and power distribution for Explosion Hazardous Areas. We specialize in creating bespoke solutions for demanding requirements. Our customers recognize us for our quality and reliability.
       </p>
       <p>
        The Atexor team plays an active role on international committees developing standards for Ex-equipment. All Atexor lighting products are designed and manufactured in Finland.
       </p>
      </span>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="text-block bg-white">
    <div class="container-fluid black">
     <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-8 col-sm-10 col-md-offset-2 col-sm-offset-1 text-container">
       <h2 class="p1">
        Part of Teknopower Group
       </h2>
       <p class="p1">
        Atexor Oy is wholly owned by
        <a href="http://www.teknopower.com">
         Teknopower Group
        </a>
        . With partners in over 30 countries and a strong financial and technical position, Teknopower provides solid backing for Atexor.
       </p>
       <p class="p1">
        The Teknopower Group includes Atexor, Teknoware, and FLS Finland.
        <a href="https://www.teknoware.com/en">
         Teknoware
        </a>
        is a leading provider of vehicle and emergency lighting, including trains and ships.
        <a href="https://www.flsfinland.fi/">
         FLS Finland
        </a>
        makes LED display systems, parking guidance and management solutions.
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="full-lift">
    <div class="desktop-image-always">
     <div style="background-image: url('https://www.atexor.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/atexor_meet_the_team_banner_darker.jpg');">
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="container-fluid top white">
     <div class="row no-margin">
      <div class="col-md-4 col-md-offset-4 col-sm-8 col-sm-offset-2 center text-container">
       <h2>
        Meet Our Team
       </h2>
       <p>
        <p>
         Our team includes leading experts in the Ex-lighting industry, and our in-house experience is unmatched. We are ready to take on any Explosion Hazardous Area lighting challenge you have.
        </p>
       </p>
       <a class="button" href="https://www.atexor.com/company/team/" target="">
        Get to know us
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="clearfix">
   </div>
   <div class="text-block bg-white">
    <div class="container-fluid black">
     <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-8 col-sm-10 col-md-offset-2 col-sm-offset-1 text-container">
       <h2>
        Our Customers
       </h2>
       <p class="p1">
        Atexor serves customers in a wide range of industries and applications: oil and gas, petrochemical, refineries, mining, drill ships, manufacturing, mills, transport, firefighting, defense, chemicals, and semiconductors. Our customers rely on us to provide safe, dependable Ex-lighting for both portable and fixed applications in Ex Zones.
       </p>
       <h2>
        Our Story
       </h2>
       <p class="p1">
        Built on the combined excellence of Centaurea Oy and Mica Elektro Oy Ltd., Atexor Oy has 40 years of experience in Ex-lighting solutions. We continually strive to create better solutions for our customers around the world. In addition to our Finnish operations, we established Atexor Ltd. in the UK in 2016.
       </p>
       <p class="p1">
        Our in-house knowledge, skill and expertise give us exceptional, wide-ranging capabilities. We can design and manufacture everything from individual, bespoke luminaires to complete, turnkey Ex-lighting solutions.
       </p>
       <p class="p1">
        With an ISO 9001:2015 Management System and ATEX certified production, our products and solutions are the result of world-class engineering, proven through end-to-end testing. We have our own design, testing and manufacturing facilities in Finland, which helps us ensure quality and timely deliveries.
       </p>
       <p>
        Link to the ISO 9001:2015 certificate and other
        <a href="https://www.atexor.com/downloads/">
         important files from our Downloads page.
        </a>
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>

  <script type="text/javascript">
   var d = new Date();

		// If clicked the no button in modal
		$('#modal-no').click(function(){

			$('.popup-modal-container').addClass('hidden');
			$('body').removeClass('fixed');

			setCookie('atexorpopup', 1, d);
		});

		// If clicked the yes button in modal
		$('#modal-yes').click(function(){

			var url = $(this).data('url')
			
			$('.popup-modal-container').addClass('hidden');
			$('body').removeClass('fixed');

			setCookie('atexorpopup', 1, d);

			// redirect to the selected page
			window.location.href = url;
		});


		function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
		  	var d = new Date();
		  	d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
		  	var expires = "expires="+ d.toUTCString();
		  	
		  	document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires + ";path=/";
		}

		
		function getCookie(cname) {
		  	var name = cname + "=";
		  	var decodedCookie = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);
		  	var ca = decodedCookie.split(';');
		  
		  	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		    	var c = ca[i];
		    		
	    		while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') {
	      			c = c.substring(1);
	    		}
	    
	    		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
	      			return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
	    		}
		  	}
		  
		  	return "";
		}


		function checkCookie() {
		  	var cookie = getCookie("atexorpopup");

		  	var seconds = '120';
			var pages = '5';

		  	// If cookie is not set
		  	if (cookie != "") {

		  	// If cookie is set
		  	} else {

		  		if(seconds){

		  			// The time after modal shows
					var time = seconds * 1000;

					// Show modal after the set time
					setTimeout( function(){
						$('.popup-modal-container').removeClass('hidden');
						$('body').addClass('fixed');
					}, time );
				}

			
				if(pages){
					// Get number of visited pages
					var visitedPages =  parseInt(getCookie('atexorpages'));


					// If number is the same as settings show modal
					if(visitedPages >= pages){

						// Show modal after 3 seconds
						setTimeout( function(){
							$('.popup-modal-container').removeClass('hidden');
							$('body').addClass('fixed');
						}, 2000 );

					// Add 1 to visited pages numbers
					} else if(visitedPages){

						var newNumber = visitedPages +1;
						setCookie('atexorpages', newNumber, d);

					// If there is no visited pages set number at 1
					} else{

						setCookie('atexorpages', 2, d);
					}
				}
		   		
		  	}
		}

		checkCookie();
  </script>
